title: Stuck in low priority queue, caused by previous patch fault.
body:
In the previous patch i was unable to get into the game after champion select for multiple games. This fault put me into a lower priority queue. Since the new patch update i am now able to enter game but i am still in the low priority queue.

Is it possible to get removed from the lower priority queue since it was a Riot Games fault that caused this problem?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately not as LeaverBuster punishments are not able to be removed under any circumstance, see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for more information.

>**CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?**
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.
